QuestData.Title: City of Drowned Friends
QuestData.Description: Champion, I have a personal favor to ask of you. This is not on behalf of the Horde or the war effort.$B$BIt has been over ten thousand years since I last walked these streets. I knew many of these people, even trained some of them.$b$bWill you walk with me as I learn their fates? The road is dangerous, and I do not trust myself to maintain calm as I try to resurface old grief.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help First Arcanist Thalyssra search the Drowned Market.
